title: Nuget build reconstruction - Repo root build
body:
## Background

More details in https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8510

Based on https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/pull/8475 create prototype of reconstructing nuget build based on running the `donet build` on repo root (or pssibly trying to discover some common build script like `build.cmd`, `build.ps1`, `build.cake` etc).

## Expected output

Prototype pluggable to https://github.com/dotnet/msbuild/issues/8510
